To everyone crying about rare skins, boo friggedy hoo. One, Riot is going to compensate you. I had the original haunting Nocturne, and when he got re-released, I got a nifty little decoration on the loading screen for that skin. It's a way for Riot to give people old content while still acknowledging the legacy players. Two, some people didn't have the opportunity to buy the skin when they came out. Some of us were/are in the military and we're on deployment when these events happen. Should we be punished because we're serving? Maybe someone had a family emergency and didn't have a nickel to spare when the event started so they couldn't get the skin when it came out. Should they be punished for being responsible and understanding the value of a dollar when a crisis arose? 
If you're really against players having another chance at getting content when Riot is still going to give you something to acknowledge you had it vintage, you're just downright selfish.
Your logic really doesn't fit your name. Well played sir
I find your name extremely offending. Given the shooting at our parliament. I'm amazed that Riot let you keep that name considering they change most offending names quickly.

That's not the problem. It's called "Limited Edition", and there's nothing "Limited" about it. I wouldn't have bought them if I knew that I could get them again every year and regret spending the money on something that was supposed to never come out again.
Riot is just lazy. Instead of coming out with new skins, they make two and re-release all the rest. Riot is running it's course.

Well, it is technically still 'Limited Edition'. Were it not, they would be in the store all year every year. But they're not, they're made available during holidays and taken down when the holiday is over. It's not like King Rammus is being put in the store or anything (because that is something that people would lose it over.)

That being said, if I remember right RIOT gave custom borders or something to everyone owning a skin on it's first release, so yours is still special. 

Not that I think that a particular texture for a particular champion in a video game is something to get upset over in the first place. As if there aren't more important problems to focus on in, I don't know... Outside? The best MMO.
